data.app_name: Theme Park with detailed Dark Ride
data.description:
Step into a growing Theme Park like no other—a realm of magic right in your living room!

This is an Early Access app, but don’t let that fool you; it’s a polished experience that will leave you craving more. Your purchase includes a park pass that not only grants access to the open-world Theme Park grounds, designed for both standing and seated experiences, but also to Act 1 of 'Into the Metaverse,' our award-winning first dark ride. Plus, your pass will automatically unlock Acts 2 and 3, as well as 'The Haunted Castle' ride, as soon as their Imagineering is complete (in progress and available for viewing on our Discord for those interested in the behind-the-scenes Imagineering process).

'Into the Metaverse' is a 14.5-minute journey, perfect for solo or multi-rider experiences with friends and loved ones. Drawing inspiration from the best dark rides in top theme parks, it's a slow-moving, narrated adventure exploring humanity's quest for ever-deeper immersive experiences. Beloved by gamers and non-gamers alike, this is just the beginning of something truly special in the Metaverse. For a sneak peek at the magic ahead, wander through Core Plaza and explore the world currently being imagineered.

While we’re still in Early Access, the park has already climbed to the top-rated titles on the Quest, with many noting something truly special is taking shape. We can't wait for you to experience it and are deeply grateful for your support in bringing the magic to life, anywhere, anytime.
